title: Battery Level Indicator Frozen after Updated to Android 11. Where's Google? Thousands suffering same
content:
Updated my Pixel 3 to Android 11 a week ago.
Battery level indicator frozen at 49% since. 
I see MANY PEOPLE on many threads have been suffering the same fault for MONTHS!...with no resolution, and I have posted on another thread. 
Google: please respond and fix this! It makes the phone relatively useless, or at least jeopardy/Russian roulette whenever taking my phone out, as I don't know what the charge is! 
(Any solution that involves a "factory reset" won't be happening as I'm not wiping my phone, and I see other owners that have tried that says it doesn't make a difference)
Frustrated, disappointed. Won't be buying Pixel/Android again if this doesn't get resolved soon.
